description:
Learn the tools and strategies you need to run profitable Facebook ads.

Build your audience, grow your list and turn Facebook users into paying customers.

  • Grow a huge following of loyal fans with the proven global ad secret
  • Reduce your cost per click by mastering the art of Social Proof ads
  • Learn the secret to using viral photos and the photo stack to skyrocket your Facebook engagement and conversion

A Worldwide, Targeted Audience at Your Fingertips.

Learning how to market your business on Facebook can put your sales, your lead generation and your profits on autopilot.

Facebook changes its algorithm regularly, but there are a few proven strategies that always work, always convert and stay effective even as the landscape of Facebook grows and evolves. Learn the strategies that will stand the test of time and give you the best return on your investment. 

Content and Overview 

Suitable for every business owner and any level of technical savvy, this course will provide the tools you need to start using Facebook as your personal bank. 

13 video modules and exercises, will walk you through, step by step, how to run profitable Facebook ads. You’ll learn what makes some ads hugely profitable and what makes others fall flat. You’ll learn how to create a photo stack on your business page that will organically grow your likes, comments and engagement.

You’ll learn how to laser target your ad using the Audience Insight tool and Power Editor so that you are never wasting time and money marketing to people who are not your ideal client. You’ll learn how to inexpensively boost a post and drive traffic to your main site and your lead generation pages. 

Upon completing this course, you will have mastered a formula for high-converting Facebook ads that you can rinse and repeat for each new business and marketing endeavor.
title: Profitable Facebook Ads Step-by-Step
